description: This Dart file defines the 'Purchase' class, representing a purchase record in the mobile app. It includes fields for purchase details, a factory method for JSON deserialization, and a formatted price getter.

classes.name: Purchase
classes.description: Model class representing a purchase, including fields for IDs, price, currency, status, timestamp, and optional book details.

methods.name: Purchase.fromJson
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Purchase instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: priceFormatted
methods.description: Returns the purchase price formatted as a currency string based on the currency type.
